channel.title: Usb on Middleware Warez
channel.description: Recent content in Usb on Middleware Warez

item.title: Persistent serial identifiers with udev
item.description: It is not a secret that Linux can juggle USB serial ports between restarts. This is something which doesn’t happen on linux, but if you ever looked at internet forums on how to fix issue, you for sure found advice to use custom udev rules.
